pullRequest.title: [BEAM-7390] Add combineglobally code snippets
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add CombineGlobally code snippets.
R: @aaltay
R: @rosetn
Staged: http://apache-beam-website-pull-requests.storage.googleapis.com/12252/documentation/transforms/python/aggregation/combineglobally/index.html

Thank you for your contribution! Follow this checklist to help us incorporate your contribution quickly and easily:

 Choose reviewer(s) and mention them in a comment (R: @username).
 Format the pull request title like [BEAM-XXX] Fixes bug in ApproximateQuantiles, where you replace BEAM-XXX with the appropriate JIRA issue, if applicable. This will automatically link the pull request to the issue.
 Update CHANGES.md with noteworthy changes.
 If this contribution is large, please file an Apache Individual Contributor License Agreement.

See the Contributor Guide for more tips on how to make review process smoother.

nodes.bodyText: @aaltay can you confirm if this and the rest of the descriptions are correct? Thanks!

"Called once per CombineFn instance when the CombineFn instance is done." -> this will be runner dependent. I would drop this.
"After all accumulators have been merged into a single final accumulator, extract_output allows to do additional calculations." -> I will simplify this to drop the part about merging. This could be called without any merging (e.g. the case where there are not other accumulators to merge.)
"This is useful for calculating averages, percentages, or anything that needs aggregate information from all the elements." -> This describers combiners in general. Combiners need the whole interface including extract_output to to accomplish this goal.

commit.message: Merge branch 'combineglobally-docs' of github.com:davidcavazos/beam into combineglobally-docs
Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/apache/beam into combineglobally-docs
